title: Excerice and Renewable energy
description: A marathon around the city on energy producing bicycles to promote green energy and fuel savings
highlights: Increased physical activity. Free hydrating drinks supplied by the national bicycling team.
typicalDay: A strainsome but enjoyful ride around the cities popular places
freeDay: After the event is over, everyone is free to return to their homes to rest
requirements: Good heart health, light clothes and a helmtet
recommendedFor: bicyclists and lovers of nature and sightseeing
